snippet: Tuesday’s highlights from around the Web include an image of Syrian rebels fighting with the aid of an iPad. Plus, an investigation into what Facebook ads say about you, or why Facebook thinks you need to lose belly fat.
abstract: Tuesday’s highlights from around the Web include an image of Syrian rebels fighting with the aid of an iPad. Plus, an investigation into what Facebook ads say about you, or why Facebook thinks you need to lose belly fat.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Modern Warfare, and What Facebook Ads Say About You
